name: Scared Scaridae
description:
Clean all the rocks to grow beautiful corals!

the Parrotfish has the important job to keep rocks clean from algaes harmful to its coral. But if the Parrotfish will go extinct, who will help corals grow healthy?

How to play:

Move the mouse to control the fish and clean the rocks covered with algaes. The process is automatic. If you clean them enough they will grow coral!

When the sharks comes hide behind a full-grown coral, keeping the mouse still.

If the cursor doesn't match the fish, try to reload the page.
